Directories to Convert Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»LLB Manager, select a directory to convert, and click the Convert Directories and LLBs button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to convert directories to LLBs.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • LabVIEW will convert the following directories to LLBs—Displays the directories you selected to convert to LLBs.
  • LabVIEW cannot convert the following directories because they contain subdirectories or files you cannot save in an LLB—Displays directories that might contain files other than LLBs.
  • Convert—Converts the directories you selected to LLBs.
